# RUN: llvm-mc -triple aarch64-none-linux-gnu -mattr=+v8.4a --disassemble < %s | FileCheck %s
# RUN: llvm-mc -triple aarch64-none-linux-gnu -mattr=+v8r --disassemble < %s | FileCheck %s

0xa0,0x54,0x18,0xd5
0xa0,0x54,0x38,0xd5
0xc0,0x54,0x18,0xd5
0xc0,0x54,0x38,0xd5
0x80,0x54,0x38,0xd5

0x40,0x55,0x18,0xd5
0x40,0x55,0x38,0xd5
0x60,0x55,0x18,0xd5
0x60,0x55,0x38,0xd5

#CHECK:  mrs x0, ERXPFGCTL_EL1

#CHECK:  mrs x0, ERXPFGCDN_EL1
#CHECK:  mrs x0, ERXPFGF_EL1
